EmailTemplate.description: Notifies RS partner to submit IX form 7 days after IX disursal
EmailTemplate.name: RL Partner - IX Form Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Submit {!Opportunity.Name}'s Interconnection Docs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.Partner_tag_lookup__c},
BlueWave has submitted registration for {!Opportunity.Name}'s system with the MA Production Tracking System. We will reach out to you if any additional information is needed to complete the registration.
Sincerely, BlueWave Customer Care customercare@bluewavesolar.com (844) 786 - 4100
